    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public static void getData(android.app.Activity uiActivity,
                           java.lang.String reason,
                           PLibAccessCallback flowAccessCallback,
                           boolean achieveDataBeforeDecision,
                           IAccessHandler accessHandler)
        Requests a specialized data through the privacy library.

        The permission to get this data is either defined through previous calls or at runtime by a p-lib popup, in which the runtime user is requested to define, whether the data has to be granted for request to the caller in its original form or anonymized, if anonymization is possible for the given data type. Furthermore, the runtime user can decide to neglet the given request. In dependency of the runtime user's decision or, if defined in previous sessions, the callback handler will fire up the method grantedData(T grantedData) with the original requested data, an anonymized form or a with a null-object. Runtime decisions can be made permanently by checking a given checkbox within the p-lib popup at runtime. Such permanently decision can be made depend on the current position of the stack trace of the caller app or independ of it by checking the corresponding checkbos. Permanent decisions can be modified within the p-lib settings.

        Permanent decisions will be permanently dependent on the data type which is requested and a given description of the method caller, in which the reason why to grant data is shown to the runtime user during a popup (and if desired in dependency of the current stack trace).

        Parameters:
        uiActivity - An Activity UI is required in order to be able to show a popup.
        reason - A string representing a message, in which the runtime caller can get motivated to grant access. The string message will be presented to the runtime user during a popup.
        flowAccessCallback - A callback, which is fired after user decision (or automaticly generated decisions due to permanent made decisions)
        achieveDataBeforeDecision - If true, an internal request will be done and shown to the user during popup, independent of the user's decision. Note: After an user decision, a second call will be done!
        accessHandler - An access handler in which specialized methods for getting the data are defined.
